title: Yoplait Yogurt Drink
generatedText: In the mood for yogurt drink? You could try Yoplait Yogurt Drink. We recommend choosing products with short ingredient lists, as these tend to be less processed. This product has 26 ingredients. This product contains 70 calories, 1.5g grams of fat, 2g grams of protein, and 11g grams of carbs per serving. This product contains no ingredients that some research suggests you should avoid.

ingredients.name: cultured pasteurized grade a reduced fat milk
tricalcium phosphate
ingredients.description: Since tricalcium phosphate is usually derived from minerals, it is probably suitable for vegans and vegetarians. If in doubt, contact the manufacturer.

ingredients.name: natural flavor
ingredients.description: The term "natural flavors" can hide a lot of gross sources of flavor, such as the notorious castoreum from the anal sacs of beavers. Of course, this does not mean these flavorings are harmful, but since you cannot really be sure of what you are getting, it is wise to be cautious.

ingredients.name: food color
ingredients.description: Color additives are tricky - both colors that we might perceive as natural (e.g. fruit juice and turmeric) and artificial colors (e.g. Red 3) might turn up on a food label under "artifical color" or "color added." This makes it difficult to know how safe these colorings are, since you do not know exactly what you are consuming. The FDA is wise not to make a distinction, however, because the process of extracting natural colors is far from natural and these substances are not necessarily safer!

ingredients.name: phosphate
ingredients.description: The Environmental Working Group recommends limiting consumption of phosphate-based additives until more research has been done on their health effects.

ingredientList: Lowfat Yogurt (Cultured Pasteurized Grade A Reduced Fat Milk, Sugar, Modified Corn Starch, Kosher Gelatin, Tricalcium Phosphate, Pectin, Vitamin A Acetate, Vitamin D3), Water, Banana Puree, Omega-3 DHA Algal Oil, Natural Flavor, Colored with Turmeric Extract. Contains Live and Active Cultures
